# ```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# ```

Load the necessary library 
```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Now load data into CSV file:
```{r}
flow_data = read_csv(file = here::here("reanalysis_data","5020959.csv"))

```
Extract average monthly flow values from the reanalysis data:
```{r}
mnth_flw <- flow_data %>% 
  mutate(datetime = lubridate::as_date(datetime)) %>% 
  mutate(year  = lubridate::year(datetime),
         month = lubridate::month(datetime),
         day   = lubridate::day(datetime)) %>% 
  group_by (month) %>% 
  summarise(av_flow = mean(`streamflow_m^3/s`))

```

Save the average monthly flow values to a csv file:
```{r}
write_csv(mnth_flw, file = here::here("reanalysis_data", "clim-5020959.csv"))
```
